learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate the appropriate background in physics that will enable the successful completion of the postgraduate coursework program.

assessments.category: Computer Code, Paper/ Report/ Annotation, Notebook/ Logbook, Practical/ Demonstration, Presentation, Poster, Project, Thesis
assessments.task_description:
Individual assessment items developed especially for the student.  Precise details of tasks and assessment are given individually. 

Assessment items may include the following: assignments, literature surveys, seminars, exams, etc. 

The assessment items within the "Tasks Developed for Each Student" assessment will be such that none will exceed 60% of the 100% mark, and at least one will be identity verified.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
